name: Aesthetic
desc:
Be everything you want, but still aesthetic ! Discover the collection of aesthetic oversize clothing for bodybuilder and athlete.

Creation of an identity as well as complete development.

name: BC-Shop
desc:
Welcome to BC SHOP Bikes and Caffe!

Performance road, gravel, enduro or marathon mountain bike, find your next bike ready to accompany you for all your desires among the most beautiful machines present at BC Shop.
Accessories, components, equipment, come and take advantage of expert advice.
Rental Ebikes and enduro mountain bikes, we have teamed up with Jura Sick Guide to offer you some very nice bikes on the surrounding paths.

And to perk you up, recharge bikes or pilots, BC Shop is also a café where Coralie offers sweet, savory, local beers and good coffee.
All homemade of course! (and even the dishes come from Haut Jura ;)

Creation of an identity as well as complete development.

name: Calceare
desc:
Calceare is a web-application that allows any Sneakers fan to sell their products such as collectibles.

Creation of an identity as well as complete development.

name: MMI_Montbeliard
desc:
Presentation site of the BUT MMI of Montbéliard

Creation of a graphic identity and implementation of a website in headless CMS.

This project allows the graphic flexibility of a front in VueJS and the manageability of a back with Wordpress

name: EcoHighland
desc:
